dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. Originally issued on the same sheet with a map of Mytilene. "The initials NB or NBF ... stand for N(atale) B(onifacio) F(ecit)."--Zacharakis, C.G. Catalogue of printed maps of Greece. From: Civitatum aliquot insigniorum, et locor[um], magis munitor[um] exacta delineatio ... Venetiis : Donati Bertelli formis, 1574. Date of publication from Zacharakis.
